WaveDDB.DDB_Start_1P_01_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="02b6045855504b6782826ea18bdac925" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]We mogen niet verliezen!
WaveDDB.DDB_Start_1P_01_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="01a9a5ef47914c9ba1d3388e8572fb71" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Laat zien wie hier de baas is!
WaveDDB.DDB_Start_1P_02_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="2a77aad38ca341beb71c3cdb589d02a4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Ik ga m'n best doen!
WaveDDB.DDB_Start_1P_02_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="caf4f4d106a748ba842133374b8e20b1" Scale="0.9289618"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Jij bent niet de enige Dandori-expert!
WaveDDB.DDB_Start_1P_03_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="860fb18bb46f43cfa922297d8e09e359" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Kijk en leer!
WaveDDB.DDB_Start_1P_03_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="10f85c85ee354feaa7be0b1388774afc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Ik zal je laten zien hoe het hoort!
WaveDDB.DDB_Start_2P_01_00: [Npc:Icon chara="OlimarLeaf"/][UE:Meta key="0c8076965e6944549763e94c1f69ae9b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatarDDB" name="Command"/]Pas maar op voor mijn Dandori.
WaveDDB.DDB_Start_2P_01_01: [Npc:Icon chara="OlimarLeaf"/][UE:Meta key="81b6d6c8e46f4e2bae7499b6f1f9f3ad" Scale="0.9327846"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatarDDB" name="Angry"/]Me inhouden... is geen goede Dandori.
WaveDDB.DDB_Start_2P_02_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="4e13873e98f94421af76268cb2aeef11" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Het is alles of niets!
WaveDDB.DDB_Start_2P_02_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="6d76f28baf5b42ce9c0a3f70b153a519" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Alvast sorry voor je verlies!
WaveDDB.DDB_Start_2P_03_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="ae225047778e4906b8ee5bbb0cb2059e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Wat een gedoe...
WaveDDB.DDB_1PScoreLead_Progress_2P_01_00: [Npc:Icon chara="OlimarLeaf"/][UE:Meta key="2cad918626f24abd8bfa51c23ce7114b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatarDDB" name="Surprise"/]Jouw Dandori is... bijzonder goed.
WaveDDB.DDB_1PScoreLead_Progress_2P_01_01: [Npc:Icon chara="OlimarLeaf"/][UE:Meta key="f42292e55e6545ac92625b8a9b9ec017" Scale="0.9927008"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatarDDB" name="Angry"/]Mijn Dandori komt vanzelf op gang!
WaveDDB.DDB_1PScoreLead_Progress_2P_02_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="acaf92fea7d44e82a5a2632593ab1b07" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SurpriseFaceNormal"/]Je bent hier best goed in!
WaveDDB.DDB_1PScoreLead_Progress_2P_02_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="76938275f28a4c5ba84e23922bf73e16" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Het is nog niet voorbij!
WaveDDB.DDB_1PScoreLead_Progress_2P_03_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="d6ddedab81b74e5a8968869c5dc321e2" Scale="0.9855072"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Ik heb hier een slecht gevoel over...
WaveDDB.DDB_1PScoreLead_Progress_2P_03_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="d2c3452c47164924971beebf81ceb5a4" Scale="0.9883721"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Moet ik serieus moeite gaan doen?
WaveDDB.DDB_2PScoreLead_Progress_2P_01_00: [Npc:Icon chara="OlimarLeaf"/][UE:Meta key="8d3fbded6c5542f686f5d74e424b497c" Scale="0.9631728"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatarDDB" name="Question"/]Lukt het een beetje met je Dandori?
WaveDDB.DDB_2PScoreLead_Progress_2P_01_01: [Npc:Icon chara="OlimarLeaf"/][UE:Meta key="16d2f46a4d3c4862a97535278fd1e301" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatarDDB" name="Yes"/]Niet slecht.
WaveDDB.DDB_2PScoreLead_Progress_2P_02_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="5bd4f2dcf66a4033b6d7a880654e84a2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Dat kan beter, toch?
WaveDDB.DDB_2PScoreLead_Progress_2P_02_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="5174b35a6886441184acf5658ea8c9de" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Helemaal niet slecht!
WaveDDB.DDB_2PScoreLead_Progress_2P_03_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="eb667bd49440465eaf5e651ae546c906" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Bedankt dat je je inhoudt.
WaveDDB.DDB_2PScoreLead_Progress_2P_03_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="356e8213d64e4d6c816b06a99922b92c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Dit is niet al te moeilijk.
WaveDDB.DDB_ScoreEven_Progress_01_00: [Npc:Icon chara="OlimarLeaf"/][UE:Meta key="16d036e6e9ff4c2480231e780db6ce2c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatarDDB" name="Angry"/]Er kan nog van alles gebeuren...
WaveDDB.DDB_ScoreEven_Progress_01_01: [Npc:Icon chara="OlimarLeaf"/][UE:Meta key="acf6061b10b5467aae65d479be2909f8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Onze Dandori is in balans.
WaveDDB.DDB_ScoreEven_Progress_02_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="fe38a241a7f445c0a2df7862e405085d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]De winnaar is nog niet bepaald!
WaveDDB.DDB_ScoreEven_Progress_02_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="0ffff8c04e3a4157833870ded410e2db" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Wat een spannend duel!
WaveDDB.DDB_ScoreEven_Progress_03_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="eacbd2d1bc3e435a9a1ddc2c5aecc207" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Jij bent een taaie...
WaveDDB.DDB_ScoreEven_Progress_03_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="a0bd7f04bc984d4680570e14c326024e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Het verschil is niet groot.
WaveDDB.DDB_1PScoreLead_Last1min_2P_01_00: [Npc:Icon chara="OlimarLeaf"/][UE:Meta key="49bb2153403941419bc4c6ad3d9259cd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatarDDB" name="Sad"/]Als dit zo doorgaat, verlies ik...
WaveDDB.DDB_1PScoreLead_Last1min_2P_01_01: [Npc:Icon chara="OlimarLeaf"/][UE:Meta key="0bea0e75b16e4917919c392666889d56" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatarDDB" name="Surprise"/]Wat een krachtige Dandori...
WaveDDB.DDB_1PScoreLead_Last1min_2P_02_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="d20f102ecbb64fa48582ed3323158ce1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Ik verlies als dit zo doorgaat...
WaveDDB.DDB_1PScoreLead_Last1min_2P_03_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="171bb43e93c64177abc6f9687247be32" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Jij bent sterk...
WaveDDB.DDB_2PScoreLead_Last1min_2P_01_00: [Npc:Icon chara="OlimarLeaf"/][UE:Meta key="49cfc58882334a1997ca37581f8f6da0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatarDDB" name="Glad"/]Met mijn Dandori moet ik winnen!
WaveDDB.DDB_2PScoreLead_Last1min_2P_01_01: [Npc:Icon chara="OlimarLeaf"/][UE:Meta key="70054cff254d4edbbeb881b76abd3c34" Scale="0.9756098"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatarDDB" name="Question"/]Heb je het in je om het tij te keren?
WaveDDB.DDB_2PScoreLead_Last1min_2P_02_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="7fae592a99174a27b1f6b5c9cbcd7f2e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Ik ben er bijna...
WaveDDB.DDB_2PScoreLead_Last1min_2P_02_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="c80156b7ba5f4dd6bd19854bcd82fe33" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Wie weet, misschien win je nog...
WaveDDB.DDB_2PScoreLead_Last1min_2P_03_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="d80ba790060e4090adf7a1778194e9d7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Appeltje-eitje voor mij.
WaveDDB.DDB_2PScoreLead_Last1min_2P_03_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="22316eae6e1244aaa0a66d89a4009271" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Wat maak je het me makkelijk.
WaveDDB.DDB_ScoreEven_Last1min_01_00: [Npc:Icon chara="OlimarLeaf"/][UE:Meta key="c421168682dc4b16bcd22ee3258108e2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatarDDB" name="Command"/]Ik vertrouw op mijn Dandori!
WaveDDB.DDB_ScoreEven_Last1min_01_01: [Npc:Icon chara="OlimarLeaf"/][UE:Meta key="f213d67e2249470c8690f979f78d450d" Scale="0.952381"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatarDDB" name="Angry"/]Pas aan het einde is er een winnaar!
WaveDDB.DDB_ScoreEven_Last1min_02_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="6a121a3e8c04490499b8189da9e97905" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Ik ga je verslaan!
WaveDDB.DDB_ScoreEven_Last1min_02_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="c3cc69ac4ebb4f37b93f3ae4fa997a18" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]We zullen zien wie er wint!
WaveDDB.DDB_ScoreEven_Last1min_03_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="a54fd9945edb452d9f5871011610da71" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Ik wil niet verliezen...
WaveDDB.DDB_ScoreEven_Last1min_03_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="2774359aa57a457f89cac2d61c531ac9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Geef snel op voordat ik je versla.
WaveDDB.DDB_Small_ScoreLead_1P_01_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="b11bf6f4e67e4c7aa8014dd59c8358dc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJob"/]Dat gaat vlotjes!
WaveDDB.DDB_Small_ScoreLead_1P_02_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="5d4c0989e32748c39c6fc920b3c1c6a5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Ik kan niet zomaar opgeven!
WaveDDB.DDB_Small_ScoreLead_1P_03_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="786ffdc5ca624242b990d152e1321e12" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Ik heb een mooie voorsprong!
WaveDDB.DDB_Small_ScoreLead_2P_01_00: [Npc:Icon chara="OlimarLeaf"/][UE:Meta key="f5d07921695243e19a1252ab23394743" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatarDDB" name="Yes"/]Alles loopt op rolletjes...
WaveDDB.DDB_Small_ScoreLead_2P_02_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="01cbd15997594834a90fc65829330d8b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Dit gaat van een leien dakje!
WaveDDB.DDB_Small_ScoreLead_2P_03_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="2b84c34fb7b84c53942b248697ccd63e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Het gaat best lekker...
WaveDDB.DDB_Med_ScoreLead_1P_01_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="034a7d8c66df4095b9558187be69cb0b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Knap werk! Zo hoort dat!
WaveDDB.DDB_Med_ScoreLead_1P_02_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="1d73b5ce36ac408aa402f6c8c5fc7e25" Scale="0.9956076"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Ik moet mijn voorsprong behouden!
WaveDDB.DDB_Med_ScoreLead_1P_03_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="c2269477e6504e99b3a06a7f5e96bb12" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Echt? Is dat alles wat je kunt?
WaveDDB.DDB_Med_ScoreLead_2P_01_00: [Npc:Icon chara="OlimarLeaf"/][UE:Meta key="5d073c8d47c144c4b8e1b91dca853b94" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatarDDB" name="Angry"/]Jij houdt mijn Dandori niet bij!
WaveDDB.DDB_Med_ScoreLead_2P_02_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="7d46289250e64313b459301fef0c3330" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Eens zien of je mij kunt bijhouden!
WaveDDB.DDB_Med_ScoreLead_2P_03_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="306d402d85234118a333e729578bba62" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Ik stop nooit...
WaveDDB.DDB_Large_ScoreLead_1P_02_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="781f2683a3624cdd9d0918da713efbd6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Het gaat super met mij!
WaveDDB.DDB_Large_ScoreLead_1P_03_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="ed11b1ab9820497f95727a4539b5bd6f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Ik ben onverslaanbaar!
WaveDDB.DDB_Large_ScoreLead_2P_01_00: [Npc:Icon chara="OlimarLeaf"/][UE:Meta key="80bfc4fce7c941be82b720cc0b907626" Scale="0.9869376"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatarDDB" name="Angry"/]Dit is de ware kracht van Dandori...
WaveDDB.DDB_Large_ScoreLead_2P_02_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="3ec8db9881c74c7b8f5ee8d1116152fc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Met ervaring win je duels!
WaveDDB.DDB_Large_ScoreLead_2P_03_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="9599d9d9b15f4f5c806e0f4281df491e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Einde oefening voor jou!
WaveDDB.DDB_AttackItem_1P_01_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="9d87cb9cfaed4753810a6c7757fb27ab" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Daar gaat ie!
WaveDDB.DDB_AttackItem_1P_02_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="95cd4b0f77c14c76a7de00add6bbc1cc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Een cadeautje van mij!
WaveDDB.DDB_AttackItem_1P_02_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="703c8f43581a4b41a1d600baf83b8ed3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Daar gaat ie!
WaveDDB.DDB_AttackItem_1P_02_02: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="2f61ff8059c14a0bb76f4bb97073d46a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Ik ga het je niet makkelijk maken!
WaveDDB.DDB_AttackItem_1P_03_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="8f9416368fd346ed818c0a329982f045" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Wat dacht je hiervan?
WaveDDB.DDB_AttackItem_2P_01_00: [Npc:Icon chara="OlimarLeaf"/][UE:Meta key="5d5c11c3037140afa303e56593e114e7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatarDDB" name="Angry"/]Dit... is voor jou!
WaveDDB.DDB_AttackItem_2P_01_02: [Npc:Icon chara="OlimarLeaf"/][UE:Meta key="93d7177fbc144e57b8343bbcfce6bee5" Scale="0.9618105"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatarDDB" name="Yes"/]Dandori is... voorwerpen gebruiken...
WaveDDB.DDB_AttackItem_2P_02_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="fde376fac2674d2791174c1f62e71618" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Wat zeg je hiervan?!
WaveDDB.DDB_AttackItem_2P_02_02: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="45b81518eec84329ac85fb290562eefe" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Voorwerpen moet je gebruiken.
WaveDDB.DDB_EnhancedItem_1P_01_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="51c6a3f28a264009a56a703d2bdb79a6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Geweldig! Meer Pikmin!
WaveDDB.DDB_EnhancedItem_1P_01_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="b3c07e977ae541d98fcdafa8dfeeb598" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Wat een gezellig ploegje!
WaveDDB.DDB_EnhancedItem_1P_01_02: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="3f74162d0e8e4e048060fc6ab0153d39" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Oh! Meer Pikmin, meer Dandori?
WaveDDB.DDB_EnhancedItem_1P_02_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="f82e1da74c524442bea05c5a6645b6a6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Geweldig! Meer Pikmin!
WaveDDB.DDB_EnhancedItem_1P_02_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="f69161d2482a4b749d8bd836365b287d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Dit belooft veel goeds!
WaveDDB.DDB_EnhancedItem_1P_02_02: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="eb9931ed7a944615b760fe922127ca8e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Oh! Meer Pikmin, meer Dandori?
WaveDDB.DDB_EnhancedItem_1P_03_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="6f0f8717ccc74b45aec42978d2876053" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Wat een gezellig ploegje!
WaveDDB.DDB_EnhancedItem_1P_03_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="be29bc81743a40eca67fce50323f00b1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Hoe meer Pikmin, hoe beter!
WaveDDB.DDB_EnhancedItem_1P_03_02: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="2c620799111248038234c2cd2bc40490" Scale="0.952381"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Een kapitein heeft bemanning nodig!
WaveDDB.DDB_EnhancedItem_2P_01_00: [Npc:Icon chara="OlimarLeaf"/][UE:Meta key="b22ed787ea0f438f98f104fd120f606f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatarDDB" name="Talk"/]Dandori... vereist een goede ploeg.
WaveDDB.DDB_EnhancedItem_2P_01_01: [Npc:Icon chara="OlimarLeaf"/][UE:Meta key="9675389c5b6044e1b121aa23c7444fda" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatarDDB" name="Glad"/]Heel veel Pikmin... Wat een geluk.
WaveDDB.DDB_EnhancedItem_2P_01_02: [Npc:Icon chara="OlimarLeaf"/][UE:Meta key="3221e43a35244fcaa1e7644b507a28be" Scale="0.9497207"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatarDDB" name="Yes"/]Meer kans om mijn Dandori te tonen!
WaveDDB.DDB_EnhancedItem_2P_02_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="3e9c878b23b342719b7013bef3488fa5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Aan de slag, ploeg!
WaveDDB.DDB_EnhancedItem_2P_02_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="5735268127924f9790e2b2a4f95013aa" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Alle hulp is welkom!
WaveDDB.DDB_EnhancedItem_2P_02_02: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="279bafa14bb44f398ff5417a51c6206e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Ha! Hier kan ik wel mee werken!
WaveDDB.DDB_EnhancedItem_2P_03_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="8f565c9f46c2465782b86899987965af" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]En toen waren er ineens meer...
WaveDDB.DDB_EnhancedItem_2P_03_02: [Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="4ee3d68b73294e038b7f4a38d5cc8dc0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Nu kan ik niet meer verliezen.
WaveDDB.DDB_Gekikara_1P_01_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="67a9105ed1a242f48a9846cb9f88314c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Snel! Haal alles binnen!
WaveDDB.DDB_Gekikara_1P_01_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="7aed19bd8a214600af7ea3dcf17a469b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Dat heeft je flink opgepept!
WaveDDB.DDB_Gekikara_1P_02_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="b3f05d5ddd2149e89218a8325284cd2c" Scale="0.968661"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Nu kunnen we snel een boel dragen!
WaveDDB.DDB_Gekikara_1P_02_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="15285961d69b4582be08bcff9c2b5f9d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Dit maakt het werk veel lichter.
WaveDDB.DDB_Gekikara_1P_03_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="4c5a2cd1eedd4c73889a8152d83fe917" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Dat heeft ons flink opgepept!
WaveDDB.DDB_Gekikara_1P_03_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="d9c50ef38fbb4aafb084ce37db1e2453" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Ha! We zijn efficiënter dan ooit!

WaveDDB.DDB_1PDogDown_03_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="80d3c9c2161444faac91c963807aae5c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Otsjin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]! Was het te veel voor je?
WaveDDB.DDB_2PDogDown_01_00: [Npc:Icon chara="OlimarLeaf"/][UE:Meta key="e881b318886c4c60a8ae7fa1711a2e99" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatarDDB" name="Sad"/]O nee! Arme [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]...
WaveDDB.DDB_2PDogDown_02_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="7f8fb23a13db4385833a6b39825315d9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]! Wat is er gebeurd?!

WaveDDB.DDB_PikminIncrease_1P_01_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="f63f608c9fbb48a99d3c858e2897f386" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Dat zijn aardig wat Pikmin!
WaveDDB.DDB_PikminIncrease_1P_02_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="271dd7733a364f8988d0714167546f25" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Heel goed! Meer Pikmin!
WaveDDB.DDB_PikminIncrease_1P_03_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="1ba7f09795404a9d9bfb629a051e7512" Scale="0.9898108"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Meer Pikmin kan ik goed gebruiken!
WaveDDB.DDB_PikminIncrease_2P_01_00: [Npc:Icon chara="OlimarLeaf"/][UE:Meta key="c9e59b3e9c7c448f858e671f2f5f7da3" Scale="0.9912537"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatarDDB" name="Talk"/]Met meer Pikmin toon je je Dandori.
WaveDDB.DDB_PikminIncrease_2P_02_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="cd79400bde1044989c5997033479a3d3" Scale="0.9497207"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Je kunt nooit genoeg Pikmin hebben.
WaveDDB.DDB_PikminIncrease_2P_03_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="91ca06c5ea974ae49b9e86fd7545274c" Scale="0.9970675"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Meer Pikmin? Ja, dat is wel zo fijn.
WaveDDB.DDB_PikminIncrease_More_1P_01_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="b627cceff0f448a2b5cc5aac1a856350" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Wauw! Moet je al die Pikmin zien!
WaveDDB.DDB_PikminIncrease_More_1P_02_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="0447fa0b187c4d65aa27cb760c6e00d6" Scale="0.9537167"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]We hebben nu flink wat strijdkracht.
WaveDDB.DDB_PikminIncrease_More_1P_03_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="6b61393b1ec741f1981ea4ba71f9e3ee" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Met zoveel Pikmin ben ik tevreden!
WaveDDB.DDB_PikminIncrease_More_2P_01_00: [Npc:Icon chara="OlimarLeaf"/][UE:Meta key="1a4131dbbf5245f5864fb33703b859a6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatarDDB" name="Glad"/]Op zoveel Pikmin kun je bouwen.
WaveDDB.DDB_PikminIncrease_More_2P_02_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="3bab32d640ec471ea5e9c033d3834d62" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Haha! Ik heb Pikmin in overvloed!
WaveDDB.DDB_PikminIncrease_More_2P_03_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="962cb00becd44c86bbab4db5160d6eb5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Wat een boel Pikmin...

WaveDDB.DDB_PikminDead_2P_01_00: [Npc:Icon chara="OlimarLeaf"/][UE:Meta key="259b99250fba432a9c0209f9dfa5f20c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatarDDB" name="Sad"/]O, de Pikmin...

WaveDDB.DDB_PikminDead_2P_02_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="d00ad3e37bfa43169d4575157c4aaad5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SurpriseFaceNormal"/]Och, sorry Pikmin...
